content: 2 working in spiral start with dark do not fasten_off the main beam brown yarn continue from the beam tines make 2 round 5 join the tine make 12 single_crochet 6 single_crochet from round 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet the tine and 6 single_crochet from the main beam round 2-3 6 single_crochet round 6 2 single_crochet in the next 2 sts decrease x3 9 fasten_off sts main beam make 2 round 7 1 single_crochet in the next st decrease x3 6 sts round 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet fasten_off leave a long tail to sew to the round 2-4 6 single_crochet hat long tail hat as shown in picture working in spiral start with red round 11-13 42 single_crochet round 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 14 6 single_crochet in the next 6 st increase x 6 48 round 2 6 increase 12 sts sts round 3 single_crochet in the next st increase x 6 18 sts round 15 48 single_crochet round 4 2sc in the next 2 st increase x 6 24 round 16 7 single_crochet in the next 7 st increase x 6 54 sts sts round 5 3 single_crochet in the next 3 st increase x 6 30 round 17 54 single_crochet sts round 18 8 single_crochet in the next 8 st increase x 6 60 round 6 4sc in the next 4st increase x 6 36 sts round 7-9 36 single_crochet round 19 60 single_crochet round 10 5 single_crochet in the next 5 st increase x 6 42 invisible fasten_off sts merry christmas - from thread yarns with love
